name: I2Cdevlib-MPU9255
keywords: gyroscope, accelerometer, compass, sensor, i2cdevlib, i2c
description: The InvenSense MPU-9255 is a System in Package (SiP) that combines two chips: the MPU-6555, and the market leading, 3-axis digital compass with an on-board Digital Motion Processor (DMP) capable of processing complex MotionFusion algorithms
